attributes.action: Too Force Wiltshire Council to Resurface the highways not just patch them
attributes.additional_details:
These are causing damage to vehicle because of the poor state of the roads and the lack of maintenance for many years has i be-leave come to the point were the council must be forced to repair the roads because they not doing any thing about the matter.
We pay road tax, fuel tax, council tax, why should we have to keep paying for repairs to vehicles when damaged as a result of the state of the highways..
attributes.background: Like most people who live and drive in Wiltshire I am feed up of driving on worn out dangerous roads full of pot holes some big enough to fit a wheel in side day in day out.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here:

http://www.wiltshire.gov.uk/council-democracy-have-your-say
